definition: Spicy chicken wings coated in a tangy, hot sauce, typically served with celery and blue cheese or ranch dressing.
Breaded and fried mozzarella cheese, served with marinara sauce for dipping.

Creamy dip made with spinach, artichoke hearts, cream cheese, and parmesan, served warm with chips or bread.
